channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "It's all about the Motion"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "It's all about the Motion"

item.title: Suggestion from Paul Battley (@threedaymonk)
item.description: I share some concerns about the exclusivity and general relevance of RubyMotion talks. If you're not interested in buying into the whole Apple ecosystem (Mac + iDevice + development tools, â‚¬2000+), this might not be very useful or interesting.

item.title: Suggestion from Nikos Dimitrakopoulos (@)
item.description: As also said in http://cfp.euruko2013.org/proposals/32, I don't like the fact that RubyMotion is a commercial software with no community spirit in mind. Thus I'm not sure it fits really well with the EuRuKo spirit.
